item.description:
Sweet Summer Nights at Sweetwilliam Farm
Enjoy a fun, relaxing evening listening to the music of Brendan Hogan.

Come any time from 6 pm on and enjoy the daylight before the sun goes down. Music starts at 7 pm.

Sit outside and listen to great music. The farm is set on top of a hill with great views and a peaceful, serene feeling. You will also enjoy browsing their quaint country store.

You may bring your own food and beverages (alcohol is allowed).
Great food is also available for sale: burgers, dogs, pizza and ice cream.

Bring a chair or use one of theirs (if you get there early enough)
Be sure to bring a sweater - it gets chilly as soon as that sun goes down.
Sorry - no dogs allowed.

There is no charge for this event, but donations are appreciated for the entertainment.

For Directions, click here:
http://www.sweetwilli...
My cell is 508-381-1529.

More about the entertainment:
Released in late 2009, Hogan has written and recorded his debut CD, 'Long Night Coming', featuring original roots, modern folk, and blues-based songs, as well as two familiar standards in the folk and country genres. Read more to see who he has shared the stage with...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Jacki in her purple chair and rainbow umbrella.
item.name: Sunset Concert at Sweetwilliam Farm - Upton
